title: Our original inhabitants
creator_contributor_role: Documentary Films of India, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - India
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/India - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Cultural relativism
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Culture - Social aspects
description: The original inhabitants of India number some 25 million and belong to 172 groups spread over the sub-continent. The culture, dress, dance and music of the Gonds, Santhals, Todas, Bhils and the Nagas are amongst the tribes mentioned.
